Question
========

To repair a refrigerator you need time X. The distribution of the random variable X has a mean of 1 hour with a standard deviation of 1 hour. Your company has 70 such refrigerators. What then is the probability that the average repair job takes longer than 50 minutes?

Answerlist
----------

* 0,08
* 0,70
* 0,83
* 0,92

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.08: Incorrect
* 0.70: Incorrect
* 0.83: Incorrect
* 0.92: Correct
